svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2020-05-28T18:24:33.461Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/13.0.3 Chrome/80.0.3987.163 Electron/8.2.1 Safari/537.36" etag="VS-CeBeQT7Yt8Bi_p8Wn" version="13.0.3" type="device"><diagram id="wepEalPszasOprWehFRU" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1512px; height: 430px; padding-top: 42px; margin-left: 19px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; width: 1512px; height: 430px; background-color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #000000; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: nowrap;

tr.td:
Reason for delay and estimated
resolution time

td.font:
Reason for delay and estimated time
are valid

tr.td:
Driver is informed that the report was successful
and that they should wait for further instructions

Reason for delay and estimated time are
invalid
Driver is prompted to enter valid information

td.font:
Reason for delay or estimated time is not
filled in

tr.td:
Driver is prompted to enter information to
continue with delay report

Driver is informed of successful report and
remaining undelivered orders are

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 368px; height: 1px; padding-top: 32px; margin-left: 22px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: Use case: Report an unforeseen delay

switch.text: Use case: Report an unforeseen delay

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
